channel.title: Stuff that I need help with!
channel.description:
1. Make Random Reward Box 2. Make Donator Reward Box 3. Make Potions that give Double XP for only a bit of time 4. Make potions that give Double droprates for only a bit of time 5. Make PK cape (already have pk skill) and make it so we can only get it when we have 99 pk and we talk to the skillcapes guy. 6. Make so a shop costs poits and not coins 7. Make a tab that shows online people(already have tab but it doesnt show online people) 7.1 Make so that tab shows ping too 8. Make vinewhip with spec 9. Total level allways show 0 no matter what level you are 10. The XP boxes show at the wrong place 11. Make a music tab that shows the musics that are in the cache folder called Musics (already have tab but not musics) 12. Make a char token called "hasdonated" 13. Make a Donator cape (only people with the token "hasdonated == 50" can buy it) 14. Make a line that shows the KDR on the quest tab [DONE]
IM USING "InsidiaX" NO QUESTIONS ABOUT WHAT BASE I'M USING PLEASE!

item.title: Stuff that I need help with!
item.dc:creator: @dzertus dzertus
item.description:
@dzertus wrote:

  1. Make Random Reward Box
  2. Make Donator Reward Box
  3. Make Potions that give Double XP for only a bit of time
  4. Make potions that give Double droprates for only a bit of time
  5. Make PK cape (already have pk skill) and make it so we can only get it when we have 99 pk and we talk to the skillcapes guy.
  6. Make so a shop costs poits and not coins
  7. Make a tab that shows online people(already have tab but it doesnt show online people)
    7.1 Make so that tab shows ping too
  8. Make vinewhip with spec
  9. Total level allways show 0 no matter what level you are
  10. The XP boxes show at the wrong place
  11. Make a music tab that shows the musics that are in the cache folder called Musics (already have tab but not musics)
  12. Make a char token called “hasdonated”
  13. Make a Donator cape (only people with the token “hasdonated == 50” can buy it)
  14. Make a line that shows the KDR on the quest tab [DONE]

IM USING “InsidiaX”
NO QUESTIONS ABOUT WHAT BASE I’M USING PLEASE!

Read full topic
